title: [Medicine] Hydroxychloroquine shows no substantial antiviral activity in macaques infected with SARS-CoV-2. When the drug was used as a prophylaxis, HCQ did not confer protection against acquisition of infection. The findings do not support the use of HCQ as an antiviral treatment for COVID-19 in humans.
[Medicine] COVID-19 vaccines by Oxford, CanSino and Pfizer all trigger immune responses. Volunteers who got the vaccine candidates made antibodies and T cells against the coronavirus.
